Hey there,
thanks for visiting my website!

My name is Marlin and I’m a PhD student of theoretical physics in Hannover, Germany. I’m currently employed by the Max-Planck society (MPG) and working on deep learning applications to gravitational wave data analysis.

In my free time I like to play badminton and since September 2019 I’m also training a group of kids to do so. Other than that I enjoy to boulder and play video games.
